name: folder-customization
description: Customize your folder and subfolders based on a specific path. Set a color, text badge, emoji badge or tooltip for any folder in your workspace.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
